name: Ten Second Tilt
description:
Every 10 seconds the platform will randomly tilt from side to side and your stacked objects will change the physics of how they fall. You get 5 points for objects that stay stacked and lose 6 points for any that fall. If you can't keep your stack in frame, you lose!

CONTROLS

Left Mouse Button Down - Make objects fall down to the platform. You can only spawn objects on the platform or when clicking other objects so you must keep your stack in frame.

The higher you get, the background color changes.  What color height did your stack make it to?
